images.alt: a gif of the moment my character first arrived in the town of avalar. the train has pulled up to the platform and i can be seen just inside the doors, which are still closed. porter is on the platform next to the open gate.
a gif of my character standing in their small yellow tent.
a gif of my character standing in front of their small yellow tent.
a gif of isabelle handing my character a tree sapling, which i then plant in a garden bed in the middle of the town plaza.
a gif of my character and isabelle standing in a garden bed in the middle of the town plaza. a hole is dug in front of us.
a gif of isabelle handing my character a tree sapling as we stand in a garden bed in the middle of the town plaza. a hole is dug in front of us.
a gif of my character holding a tree sapling as isabelle and i stand in a garden bed in the middle of the town plaza. a hole is dug in front of us.
a gif of my character planting a tree sapling in the garden box in the town plaza.
a gif of my character standing in front of the planted tree sapling. isabelle and our neighbors are clapping and cheering.
